mapper.select:
SELECT xt_attachment.xt_attachment_id, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentType, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentCtime, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentSize, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentPath, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentIsDelete, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentName, xt_attachment.xt_userinfo_id, xt_attachment.xt_modules_id, xt_attachment.xt_modules_order, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentTitle, xt_attachment.xt_path_absolutek, xt_attachment.xt_path_urlk, xt_attachment.xt_path_relativek, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_attachment xt_attachment LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_attachment.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_attachment.xt_attachmentTitle = #{xt_attachmentTitle}

SELECT xt_attachment.xt_attachment_id, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentType, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentCtime, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentSize, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentPath, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentIsDelete, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentName, xt_attachment.xt_userinfo_id, xt_attachment.xt_modules_id, xt_attachment.xt_modules_order, xt_attachment.xt_attachmentTitle, xt_attachment.xt_path_absolutek, xt_attachment.xt_path_relativek, xt_attachment.xt_path_urlk, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_attachment xt_attachment LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_attachment.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_attachment_id=#{xt_attachment_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_attachment ( xt_attachment_id, xt_attachmentType, xt_attachmentCtime, xt_attachmentSize, xt_attachmentPath, xt_attachmentIsDelete, xt_attachmentName, xt_userinfo_id, xt_modules_id, xt_modules_order, xt_attachmentTitle, xt_path_absolutek, xt_path_relativek, xt_path_urlk ) VALUES ( #{xt_attachment_id}, #{xt_attachmentType}, #{xt_attachmentCtime}, #{xt_attachmentSize}, #{xt_attachmentPath}, #{xt_attachmentIsDelete}, #{xt_attachmentName}, #{xt_userinfo_id}, #{xt_modules_id}, #{xt_modules_order}, #{xt_attachmentTitle}, #{xt_path_absolutek}, #{xt_path_relativek}, #{xt_path_urlk} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_attachment SET xt_attachment_id = #{xt_attachment_id}, xt_attachmentType = #{xt_attachmentType}, xt_attachmentCtime = #{xt_attachmentCtime}, xt_attachmentSize = #{xt_attachmentSize}, xt_attachmentPath = #{xt_attachmentPath}, xt_attachmentIsDelete = #{xt_attachmentIsDelete}, xt_attachmentName = #{xt_attachmentName}, xt_userinfo_id = #{xt_userinfo_id}, xt_modules_id = #{xt_modules_id}, xt_modules_order = #{xt_modules_order}, xt_attachmentTitle = #{xt_attachmentTitle}, xt_path_absolutek = #{xt_path_absolutek}, xt_path_relativek = #{xt_path_relativek}, xt_path_urlk = #{xt_path_urlk} WHERE xt_attachment_id=#{xt_attachment_id}
mapper.delete:
